entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023
